name: Puzzle Path
description:
Puzzle Path is a 2D platformer originially developed for android where the player must swipe and spin obstacles to create a safe path to run and jump across.

It was developed in 1 month as part of my Games Design and Development masters course as a mobile game.

On PC the controls are 

A - Left
D - Right
Space - Jump
Mouse - Click the rope to cut
             - Click and hold the left arrow on the bar to spin
